title: Senior Product Data Scientist
content:
To learn the Hiring Ranges for this position, please select your location from the Apply Now dropdown menu.
To learn more about our Hiring Range System, please click this link.
Senior Product Data Scientist, Mozilla Corporation, San Francisco, California: Design and analyze experiments to understand ecosystems, user behaviors, and long-term trends. Build key data sets to empower operational and exploratory analysis. Advocate for standard methodologies across the organization. Own the definition, evaluation, and reporting of key product metrics. Communicate narratives with data to many audiences, ranging from product managers to technical leads. Sit at the intersection between product, marketing, engineering, and leadership to inform, influence, and help execute our product strategy. Must have a Bachelor's in Analytics or related field and two years of experience in: (i) performing data analysis and modeling; (ii) applying statistical methods to large datasets to derive insights; (iii) A/B testing; and (iv) working with product management. Experience may be gained concurrently. Position eligible for telecommuting from any location in the United States. 
Pay Range: $81,536 - $185,400 per year. 
Apply online: careers.mozilla.org/listings.
